item.title: Building the Poke encoder in Metasploit
item.description: Building the Poke encoder in Metasploit So as mentioned in a previous post, I built a custom encoder that would hide my payload as a string of words could not be understood by a static analysis from Antivirus solutions. Unfortunately for me, building the shell code was slightly annoying. The steps were: Use msfvenom with the payload of choice, use output it to -f num Delete the whitespace and the newline characters from the payload
